Title: Alive Day
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Cavell, Jennifer Kennedy, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Boyd finds a way to keep tabs on Ava while he works in the mine with Ava's Uncle Zachariah, And Ty orders a reluctant Choo-Choo to tie up loose ends after he kills Calhoun Schreier.
